mapper.select: select * from hospital h, pic_lib p, (select hospital_id, max(uuid) as uuid from pic_lib_rel_hospital group by hospital_id order by 1 asc) a where p.uuid = a.uuid and h.hospital_id = a.hospital_id
select a.uuid, upload_path, file_name from pic_lib a, pic_lib_rel_hospital b where a.uuid = b.uuid and hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
select count(*) from pic_lib_rel_hospital where hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
select c.* from (select a.uuid, a.upload_path, a.file_name from pic_lib a, pic_lib_rel_hospital b where a.uuid = b.uuid and hospital_id = #{hospitalId}) c where rownum = 1
